GR13somsv_u:0: sthānaṃ praveśo rūpaṃ ca lakṣaṃ lakṣaṇameva ca /
GR13somsv_u:1: utthāpanaṃ bodhanaṃ ca cakraviśrāmameva ca // SomSv_1
GR13somsv_u:5: sarveṣu trikaśāstreṣu sūcitaṃ śambhunā svayam // SomSv_3
GR13somsv_u:7: tanmadhye kandanāmā ca cakrasthānamiti smṛtam // SomSv_4
GR13somsv_u:9: samyag vāyugatiṃ jitvā yāvan madhyagatāṃ nayet // SomSv_5
GR13somsv_u:10: eṣa praveśa ity āhū rūpaṃ vakṣyāmi cādhunā /
GR13somsv_u:11: śṛṅgāṭakanibhaṃ cakraṃ ṣaḍaraṃ cāparaṃ dhruvam // SomSv_6
GR13somsv_u:14: tanmadhye nikṣipec cittaṃ yāvat tatra sthirīkṛtam /
GR13somsv_u:15: tyaktaruddho yadā vāyustadā lakṣaṃ vinirdiśet // SomSv_8
GR13somsv_u:21: etal lakṣaṇam uddiṣṭam utthāpanam ataḥ param // SomSv_11
GR13somsv_u:26: kandastho vedhayen nābhiṃ tato hṛtsthaṃ pitāmaham /
GR13somsv_u:29: bodhayitvā vrajed āśu padaṃ cānāśritaṃ śivam // SomSv_15
GR13somsv_u:31: svābhāvikaṃ dalaṃ dīptaṃ dravaṃ sthiranabhopamam // SomSv_16
GR13somsv_u:32: amṛtaṃ śekharaṃ caiva śaktirbrahmā tathaiva ca /
GR13somsv_u:33: bindunādaṃ tathā proktaṃ cakradvādaśakaṃ kila // SomSv_17
GR13somsv_u:35: viśramet sā mahādevī cakraviśrāma uttamaḥ // SomSv_18
GR13somsv_u:40: yāni yāni vikārāṇi avasthā kurute sataḥ /
GR13somsv_u:41: teṣu teṣu na bhetavyaṃ krīḍati parameśvarī // SomSv_21
GR13somsv_u:42: amṛte seyam unmattā vikārān kurute bahūn /
GR13somsv_u:46: yat saṃkrāntau romaharṣo 'srupāto jṛmbhārambho gadgadā gīr giro 'ntaḥ /
GR13somsv_u:47: granthisphoṭaḥ sparśadivyapraharṣo binduspandā nābhikandāt sphuranti // SomSv_24
GR13somsv_u:50: tadā tv astamitaṃ sarvamakṣagrāmaṃ bahiḥ sthitam /
GR13somsv_u:51: yadā sā paramā śaktiḥ sulīnā parame pade // SomSv_26
GR13somsv_u:52: tadā na vindate kiṃcid viṣayī viṣayāntaram /
GR13somsv_u:53: śive viśrāmyate śaktistadā viśrāma ucyate // SomSv_27
GR13somsv_u:56: śivībhūto bhavatyātmā pariṇāmaḥ sa eva hi /
GR13somsv_u:57: sadā sa varṣate divyam amṛtaṃ jantujīvanam // SomSv_29
GR13somsv_u:58: cittaṃ tatra tu saṃdhārya punardaivī viśettu sā /
GR13somsv_u:59: tadā tv āgamanaṃ proktamevaṃ samyak trayodaśa // SomSv_30
